profile_data.summary:
As an individual who has 3 years of work experience in data industry. I have always been interested in applying different algorithms in statistical analysis, machine learning to create business and social values. My education background and skills support me to be passionate and motivated about delivering data science solution to solve challenging problems.

My Skills:
- Statistics: Hypothesis Testing, A/B Testing, Statistical Modeling, Bayesian Modeling
- Programming Languages and Tools: Python, SQL, R
- Machine Learning: Linear Regression, Logistics Regression, Naive Bayes, Support Vector Machines, Decision Tree, Random Forest, Boosting, KNN, Ridge Regression, LASSO, K-Means Clustering, PCA, LDA, Natural Network, Deep Learning
- Tools & Technologies: AWS (Amazon Web Service), Spark, Jupyter Notebook, Tableau, Power BI, GCP (Google Cloud Platform), Hadoop, Hive, Github, Matlab


How to reach me: 
- Email: rosieqian920@gmail.com
- Github: https://github.com/RossieeyirouQian10

member.occupation: Data Science | Data Analytics | USC Master of Science Electrical Engineering

projects.description:
•	Preprocessed 150k records of labeled data, encoded features, analyzed the data with visualizations in Pandas & Seaborn
•	Evaluated Logistic Regression, Random Forest, K-Nearest Neighbor and Support Vector Machine models to predict bank customer churn rate.
•	Developed L1, L2 Regularizations with optimal parameters, prevented over-fitting and derived model performance with 5-fold Cross-Validation and confusion matrix using accuracy & precision as determining criteria.
•	Selected Random forest model with best accuracy of 86.47% and explored critical factors that impact customer churn based on feature importance technique.
projects.title: Bank Customer Churn Analysis in Python

member.occupation: Data Science | Data Analytics | USC Master of Science Electrical Engineering

projects.description:
•	Leveraged historical user review data for a watch brand with over 960k user reviews, carried out text cleansing like stop word and punctuation removal, word stemming and tokenization.
•	Evaluated the TF-IDF matrix with 10000+ prioritized word tokens and calculated matrix similarities.
•	Trained unsupervised K-Means Clustering & Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) models to classify review into 10 cluster/topics.
•	Engineered the pipeline to cluster unlabeled watch user reviews into groups and identified critical latent structures. 
•	Checked 100 potential semantic reviews and keywords from 10 different cluster/topics to evaluate model performance.
projects.title: Document Clustering and Topic Modeling on User Reviews for Watches

member.occupation: Data Science | Data Analytics | USC Master of Science Electrical Engineering

projects.description:
•	Analyzed the 390k+ loan detail records for a Lending Club with demographic, historical borrowing & credit score details. Cleansed the data, and performed missing value treatment and feature correlations.
•	Engineered 25 features & Normalized the data, and derived the processed data ready for analysis.  
•	Created a TensorFlow model in Python, to predict the probability of whether a borrower could fully pay the loan.
•	Fitted a sequential model with 3 hidden layers in Keras & plotted log loss values to gauge model fit.
•	Tuned hyper parameters & selected final model with 89% accuracy, and apply model on new customer loan record.
projects.title: Lending Club Loan Data Prediction in TensorFlow
